channel.title: Server online/offline
channel.description: How do you put your server online because i want to register it.

item.title: Server online/offline
item.dc:creator: @merk_n_a_box merk n a box
item.description:
@merk_n_a_box wrote:

to put i on line to other people go to

utorrent.com

Download complete -

Download the official µTorrent® (uTorrent) torrent client for Windows, Mac, Android or Linux-- uTorrent is the #1 bittorrent download client on desktops worldwide.


down load it go to preferences go to conection start your server first
change the port to your servers port (default 43594)
then go to http://www.whatismyip.com/
set the client to your ip
note. after restarting your computer change the ip to a random number then start the server
hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Server online/offline
item.dc:creator: @CoderNexus CoderNexus
item.description:
@CoderNexus wrote:

What do you mean?.. Like put it on a server status page or just plainly run the server? I’ll show you both:

To run the server, there should be a run.bat (something like that) in your source folder. Simply double click that and it should run. To put your server online at a server status page, just register your server here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Read full topic
